oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Progress in the Diagnosis and Treatment of Endocrine Disorders of the Dog and Cat
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mulnix, John A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: adrenal glucocorticoids
hyperadrenocorticism
hypothyroid
thyroid hormone replacement
Diabetes insipidus
dogs
cats
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An overview of treatment strategies for the diseases of the Neurohypophysis, Thyroid Gland, and Adrenal Cortex in dogs and cats. This presentation discusses therapeutic agents. various dosages, and best practices for treatment. Particular attention is given to the adrenal glucocorticoids and proper drug administration which minimizes adverse effects while maintaining therapeutic efficacy.
